name: RogueBall (AndreaRakuen, Fede965, redd096)
description:
Hey you! Yes, you!  Do you know what's better than killing monsters with a ball? Exact! Nothing! 

Enter treacherous dungeons, face dangerous enemies and become the next king of dodgeball! 

And remember the 5 D's of dodgeball: Dodge, duck, dip, dive and dodge!


Made with love by Honk Studio

Designer  
Davide Perdon

Programmer 
Martin Babino

Concept Artists 
Federico Cao
Andrea Molteni

This is our entries for the Mix and Game Jam 2020 following the theme "mixing generes". Enjoy the game and leave us a feeback if you want!
